00047 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00048 class Codec {
00049 
00050 public:
00051   enum IanaType {
00052     PCMU = 0,
00053     GSM,
00054     G723,
00055     DVI4,
00056     LPC,
00057     PCMA,
00058     G722,
00059     L16,
00060     QCELP,
00061     CN,
00062     MPA,
00063     G728,
00064     G729,
00065     CELB,
00066     JPEG,
00067     NV,
00068     H261,
00069     MPV,
00070     MP2T,
00071     H263,
00072     G726_16,
00073     G726_24, /* Does not work - crashes vocallo */
00074     G726_32, /* Works */
00075     G726_40, /* Does not work - does not crash */
00076     AMR,     /* Works */
00077     AMR_WB,  /* ??? */
00078     ILBC,
00079     G7221,
00080     GSM_EFR,
00081     EVRC_B,
00082     EVRC,
00083     UNKNOWN  = 9999
00084   };
00085 
00086   Codec(const char* encoding_name, uint32_t payload_type, size_t payload_size, 
00087       uint32_t sampling_rate, uint32_t bit_rate, bool video_flag)
00088     : encoding_name_(StrToIana(encoding_name)),
00089       payload_type_(payload_type),
00090       payload_size_(payload_size),
00091       sampling_rate_(sampling_rate),
00092       bit_rate_(bit_rate),
00093       video_flag_(video_flag) {}
00094 
00095    Codec(IanaType encoding_name, uint32_t payload_type, size_t payload_size, 
00096       uint32_t sampling_rate, uint32_t bit_rate, bool video_flag)
00097     : encoding_name_(encoding_name),
00098       payload_type_(payload_type),
00099       payload_size_(payload_size),
00100       sampling_rate_(sampling_rate),
00101       bit_rate_(bit_rate),
00102       video_flag_(video_flag) {}
00103  
00104   Codec(const Codec& rhs)
00105     : encoding_name_(rhs.encoding_name_),
00106       payload_type_(rhs.payload_type_),
00107       payload_size_(rhs.payload_size_),
00108       sampling_rate_(rhs.sampling_rate_),
00109       bit_rate_(rhs.bit_rate_),
00110       video_flag_(rhs.video_flag_) {}
00111 
00113   virtual ~Codec() {}
00114 
00115   struct Entry {
00116     IanaType type;
00117     const char* name;
00118   };
00119 
00120   const char* name() {
00121     static const Entry entries[] = {
00122       { PCMU, "PCMU" },
00123       { GSM, "GSM" },
00124       { G723, "G723" },
00125       { DVI4, "DVI4" },
00126       { LPC, "LPC" },
00127       { PCMA, "PCMA" },
00128       { G722, "G722" },
00129       { L16, "L16" },
00130       { QCELP, "QCELP" },
00131       { CN, "CN" },
00132       { MPA, "MPA" },
00133       { G728, "G728" },
00134       { G729, "G729" },
00135       { CELB, "CELB" },
00136       { JPEG, "JPEG" },
00137       { NV, "NV" },
00138       { H261, "H261" },
00139       { MPV, "MPV" },
00140       { MP2T, "MP2T" },
00141       { H263, "H263" },
00142       { G726_16, "G726-16" },
00143       { G726_24, "G726-24" },
00144       { G726_32, "G726-32" },
00145       { G726_40, "G726-40" },
00146       { ILBC, "ILBC" },
00147       { AMR, "AMR" },
00148       { AMR_WB, "AMR-WB" },
00149       { G7221, "G7221" },
00150       { GSM_EFR, "GSM-EFR" },
00151       { EVRC_B, "EVRCB" },
00152       { EVRC, "EVRC" }
00153     };
00154     size_t entries_size = sizeof( entries ) / sizeof( entries[0] );
00155 
00156     for (size_t i = 0; i < entries_size; ++i) {
00157       if (entries[i].type == encoding_name_) {
00158         return entries[i].name;
00159       }
00160     }
00161 
00162     return "unknown";
00163   }
00164 
00165   static IanaType StrToIana(const char* encoding_name) {
00166     static const Entry entries[] = {
00167       { PCMU, "PCMU" },
00168       { GSM, "GSM" },
00169       { G723, "G723" },
00170       { DVI4, "DVI4" },
00171       { LPC, "LPC" },
00172       { PCMA, "PCMA" },
00173       { G722, "G722" },
00174       { L16, "L16" },
00175       { QCELP, "QCELP" },
00176       { CN, "CN" },
00177       { MPA, "MPA" },
00178       { G728, "G728" },
00179       { G729, "G729" },
00180       { CELB, "CELB" },
00181       { JPEG, "JPEG" },
00182       { NV, "NV" },
00183       { H261, "H261" },
00184       { MPV, "MPV" },
00185       { MP2T, "MP2T" },
00186       { H263, "H263" },
00187       { G726_16, "G726-16" },
00188       { G726_24, "G726-24" },
00189       { G726_32, "G726-32" },
00190       { G726_40, "G726-40" },
00191       { ILBC, "ILBC" },
00192       { AMR, "AMR" },
00193       { AMR_WB, "AMR-WB" },
00194       { G7221, "G7221" },
00195       { GSM_EFR, "GSM-EFR" },
00196       { EVRC_B, "EVRCB" },
00197       { EVRC, "EVRC" }
00198     };
00199     size_t entries_size = sizeof( entries ) / sizeof( entries[0] );
00200     
00201     for (size_t i = 0; i < entries_size; ++i) {
00202       if (!strcmp(entries[i].name, encoding_name)) {
00203         return entries[i].type;
00204       }
00205     }
00206 
00207     return UNKNOWN;
00208   }
00209 
00210   IanaType  encoding_name_;

00212   size_t    payload_size_;
00213   uint32_t  sampling_rate_;
00214   uint32_t  bit_rate_;
00215   bool      video_flag_;
00216 
00217 };
